name: Kessler Syndrome (DMajor)
description:
Was meant as an entry into ludum dare 42, but I didn't finish in time. The theme was 'running out of space' and I liked the idea I had in mind enough to actually finish it.

The game is to launch as many satellites as you can without hitting your previous launches, you'll unlock more space as you get more into orbit. The only control is the left mouse button.
